idea: Road Radar is an innovative  MaaS platform to connect all stakeholders i.e drivers and passengers along with the traffic department. Its innovation lies in the ability to capture realtime data from multiple sources and relay it to the our algorithms to improve commute, reduce traffic and prevent accidents. With Road Radar it is possible to have barrier-less free-flow tolling system to achieve zero waiting time at toll plaza booths. With the real time data captured Road Radar will be the best Intelligent Traffic Management System(ITMS) in India and around the world.
name: ROAD RADAR PRIVATE LIMITED
